Ergonomic Benefits

Look no further than our HUANUO adjustable footrest! Whether you’re at work or at home, you can enjoy some nice relaxation!

HUANUO Foot Rest

Enjoy the feeling of relaxation at any time.

HUANUO Hot New Releases

HUANUO Office Chair&Organizer

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.4 x 13.27 x 4.41 inches; 4.63 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ HNFR3
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 24, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ HUANUO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07L3RVF7C
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Adjustable Height – Height is manually adjustable to 3 different positions: 4.3″ , 5.5 “, 6.7” (11cm/14 cm/17cm). Super easy for you to find the perfect position to suit your needs
Easy Angle Adjustment – Tilts -30°- +30°to support your legs at your preferred angle. The Angle can’t be fixed, it rocks back and forth which encourages leg movement
Massage Textured Surface – Comes with a large non-skid surface (18″ X 13″), free-floating platform texture made up of geometric circular bumps for enhanced stress reduction during the work day. Perfect for office and home use
Pre-Assembled For Use- This adjustable foot rest is pre-assembled for immediate use. Non slip feet enhances overall stability. Sturdy construction offer you comfortable experience while you’re working or studying

Look no further than our HUANUO adjustable footrest! Whether you're at work or at home, you can enjoy some nice relaxation!

Ergonomic Benefits

Great foot rest for working at a computer. Comes with the adjustability for your desired height. Features a free-floating platform that tilts back and forth which encourages full leg stretches and lower-leg movement, and helps minimize fatigue and increase circulation, which is important when sitting for long periods of time.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Multi-Position Design

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. It supports better posture and reduces physical stress. Being completely adjustable to multiple tilt angles and height settings. It allows you to find what is just right for you to relax comfortably.

Multi-Position Design

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. Choose the proper height for you to to relax comfortably.

Adjustable Heights

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. Choose the proper height for you to to relax comfortably.

Textured Surface

This foot rest comes with a textured surface made up of geometric circular bumps for enhanced stress reduction during the work day. When barefoot or wearing socks, the uneven surface creates a massaging effect on the soles of feet. Simply move your feet in any direction over the bumpy surface.

Read more

Fully Assembled

Flat design for easy storage. Comes fully assembled which makes it ready for immediate use out of box. Non slip feet enhance stress reduction and overall stability.

Read more

item.content:encoded:
Price: $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:03:25 UTC – Details)

From the brand

AMERIERGO Foot Rest

The foot rest cushion provide you with the most comfortable & firm support, suitable for every scenario and most people

AMERIERGO Ergonomic Foot Rest

AMERIERGO New Releases

AMERIERGO Foot Rest

TV tray & printer stand

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.07 x 6.77 x 6.57 inches; 1.46 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ AE-FR-03
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 8, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PAILEGAO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08CK6S682

FITS YOUR FEET PERFECTLY WITH WEDGE SHAPE – Measured as 17 x 10 x 7 inches, it is large enough to meet most people’s needs. Designed as a wedge shaped foot stool cushion.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN – This foot rest for under desk at work can provide you with comfortable & firm support on for your feet & knees
SKIN-FRIENDLY FIBER FABRIC COVER – Made of soft & breathable fiber fabric cover, our office under desk footrest is skin-friendly to put your bare feet on, providing you with a comfortable feel and helping keep your feet from sweating
MULTI-PURPOSE FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS – If you turn the foot stool over and put your feet on it, this can become a rocker to move your feet.You can also put the adjustable foot rest under your leg & back to help provide you with great support

Magic Tape for Adjusting Heights

Designed as an adjustable office foot rest, you could add or remove the additional cushion by using the magic tape as needed to get a suitable height.

Non-slip Bottom

Comes with the non-slip bottom. This foot rest pillow can be fixed in place to give you a more relaxing experience.

Smooth Zipper to Easily Remove Cover

Comes with the smooth zipper. The foot rest cushion cover is easy to remove for machine washing.

Soft Fiber Fabric Cover

Made of fiber. This fabric cover foot rest pad is skin-friendly to put your bare feet on, providing you with a comfortable experience.

Read more

Ergonomically designed with a wedge-shape, our foot rest pad can fit your foot shape perfectly, so you can enjoy a relaxed work & entertainment environment.

Comes with our magic tape. The foot rest cushion can also be adjusted to 2 heights of 5 inches and 7 inches to provide you with the most comfortable & firm support, suitable for every scenario and most people.

From the brand

Ergonomic Benefits

Look no further than our HUANUO adjustable footrest! Whether you’re at work or at home, you can enjoy some nice relaxation!

HUANUO Foot Rest

Enjoy the feeling of relaxation at any time.

HUANUO Hot New Releases

HUANUO Office Chair&Organizer

2 Optional covers for replacing – This ergonomic under desk foot rest comes with 2 optional covers. The pillowcase can be easily removed for cleaning and reusing.
Ergonomic foot rest office – Holding your feet and legs up, which makes you feel more comfortable. Relaxing your legs when you work in the office or at home.
2 Optional Heights of Foot Rests – This foot rest provides you with 2 optional heights of 4.15” and 6” and you could add or remove the additional cushion as you need to get maximum comfort. You can also move the footrest cushion under your knees or ankles when you sit on the floor or lie down.
High-quality materials – The filler is made of high-density memory cotton with excellent elasticity that fits into the soles of your feet and supports them at the same time. and you can easily take it with you on the go. You can bring our footrest on a plane, when working in the office, or just if you want to work on your laptop on the couch.
Warm tips – Footstool for under desk is vacuum-packed and can be left for a few hours before being used when opened, if any problem you can contact us any time, we will give you a supportive reply within 12 hours.

Whether you are working in the office or at home, you can enjoy the feeling of relaxation at any time!

  • Help keeping your feet and legs up, which can make you feel more comfortable.
  • Relax your legs and back when you work in the office or at home, even when you are playing games.

EASY TO ADJUST HEIGHT

The firm pillow provides a comfortable elevation of 4.15 inches with an additional 1.75 inches by attaching an extended piece. Comes with 2 optional covers & smooth zipper covers two sides and allows you to conveniently adjust the height. Whether it’s under the desk, on the sofa or bed, lying down or sitting, it always provides you with comfort

Read more

Easy assembly through magic tape

Removable & machine washable cover

High-quality foam

Read more
